note.p: Fuegian. Grandson of Orundellico (Jemmy Button). Orphaned at the age of 6. Lived at the orphanage established by the South American Mission Society at Ushuaia in the Beagle Channel, Patagonia. Given (in error) the name James Button Sulivan when support was provided for him by Bartholomew James Sulivan and others; later renamed James FitzRoy Button.
Correspondence vol. 27, letter from B. J. Sulivan, 13 October 1879
South American Missionary Magazine, 1 October 1879, p. 223
